title: PS Pixma G4500
shortdesc: Suitable for high-volume monochrome printing with additional scanning and copying features
Decription: It features a high-capacity MegaTank ink system that significantly reduces the cost of printing per page. With sharp resolutions of up to 4800 x 1200 dpi, it delivers vivid colors and crisp text. The G6020 supports wireless printing, allowing seamless connection with mobile devices and cloud services. Additionally, it offers scanning and copying functionality, making it versatile for various needs.
